body:
# Changelog

## [v1.6.0](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/tree/v1.6.0) (2023-02-03)

[Full Changelog](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/compare/v1.5.3...v1.6.0)

**Implemented enhancements:**

- Notification sound [\#173](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/issues/173)

**Fixed bugs:**

- "GLIBC\_2.34 not found" appeared when trying to run the program, .deb installed OK [\#273](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/issues/273)
- Snap version displays unreadable/misplaced fonts in KDE Plasma running wayland [\#230](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/issues/230)

# Changelog

## [v1.5.3](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/tree/v1.5.3) (2023-01-29)

**Fixed bugs:**

- "GLIBC_2.34 not found" appeared when trying to run the program, .deb installed OK #273

[Full Changelog](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/compare/v1.5.2...v1.5.3)

# Changelog

## [v1.5.2](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/tree/v1.5.2) (2023-01-23)

[Full Changelog](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/compare/v1.5.1...v1.5.2)

**Implemented enhancements:**

- How can I remove it from the system? [\#248](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/issues/248)

**Fixed bugs:**

- Use different compression mode for deb package [\#267](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/issues/267)
- Dark theme not appearing for window border in Linux Mint 21 Vanessa, Flatpak. [\#262](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/issues/262)

**Merged pull requests:**

- Add pt-br language [\#270](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/pull/270) ([filhocf](https://github.com/filhocf))
- po: add Georgian translation [\#265](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/pull/265) ([NorwayFun](https://github.com/NorwayFun))
- Update ru.po [\#263](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/pull/263) ([BrainKicker](https://github.com/BrainKicker))
- add spanish translation [\#261](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/pull/261) ([haggen88](https://github.com/haggen88))

# Changelog

## [v1.5.1](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/tree/v1.5.1) (2022-12-23)

[Full Changelog](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/compare/v1.5.0...v1.5.1)

**Implemented enhancements:**

- Introduce Prefer Dark Theme [\#256](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/issues/256)

**Fixed bugs:**

- Mic not enabled [\#252](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/issues/252)
- Flatpak and Nvidia 520.65.01 driver compatibility [\#227](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/issues/227)

**Closed issues:**

- High CPU usage when the focus is on the main window [\#115](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/issues/115)

**Merged pull requests:**

- Updated Dutch translation [\#258](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/pull/258) ([Vistaus](https://github.com/Vistaus))
- Update Italian translation [\#257](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/pull/257) ([bordam](https://github.com/bordam))
- Add Mageia Linux to README.md [\#247](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/pull/247) ([kekePower](https://github.com/kekePower))
- Add Russian translation \(ru.po + desktop.in\) [\#246](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/pull/246) ([OlesyaGerasimenko](https://github.com/OlesyaGerasimenko))

# Changelog

## [v1.5.0](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/tree/v1.5.0) (2022-10-27)

[Full Changelog](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/compare/v1.4.7...v1.5.0)

**Implemented enhancements:**

- Ctrl+P to open preferences [\#237](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/issues/237)
- Localize WFL\_FRIENDLY\_NAME and WFL\_DESCRIPTION for the desktop file [\#235](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/issues/235)
- Simplify Config & Preferences \(Breaks Backward Compatibility!\) [\#229](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/issues/229)
- Localization [\#180](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/issues/180)
- Start minimised [\#136](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/issues/136)

**Fixed bugs:**

- Preferences window is not attached to the main window [\#236](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/issues/236)
- Permission issues [\#226](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/issues/226)
- Slow responding even without hardware acceleration [\#225](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/issues/225)
- Keeps freezing/spinning the CPU [\#224](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/issues/224)
- WhatsApp For Linux starts but doesnt load, keeps in loading screen forever. [\#223](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/issues/223)
- No Display with Whatsapp business account [\#220](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/issues/220)
- Does not work with hardware acceleration + does not persist preferences [\#216](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/issues/216)
- Spell check does not work [\#215](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/issues/215)
- Flatpak version not running in Arch Linux [\#211](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/issues/211)
- No Internet Connection Pop-up [\#209](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/issues/209)
- Notification icon dissapears imediately [\#202](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/issues/202)
- Auto turn off notifications [\#194](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/issues/194)

**Merged pull requests:**

- Use official ArchLinux logo image in README [\#241](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/pull/241) ([musiclover382](https://github.com/musiclover382))
- Update Italian translation [\#240](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/pull/240) ([musiclover382](https://github.com/musiclover382))
- Add Italian translation [\#234](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/pull/234) ([musiclover382](https://github.com/musiclover382))
- Added Dutch translation [\#233](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/pull/233) ([Vistaus](https://github.com/Vistaus))
- Implement localization support [\#232](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/pull/232) ([eneshecan](https://github.com/eneshecan))
- Implement start minimized option [\#231](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/pull/231) ([eneshecan](https://github.com/eneshecan))
- Use webkit2gtk-4.1 if webkit2gtk-4.0 is not found [\#228](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/pull/228) ([kekePower](https://github.com/kekePower))

# Changelog

**Fixed bugs:**

- Permission issues [\#226](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/issues/226)
- Flatpak version not running in Arch Linux [\#211](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/issues/211)
- WhatsApp For Linux starts but doesn't load, keeps in loading screen forever. [\#223](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/issues/223)

**Fixed bugs:**

- "GDBus.Error:org.freedesktop.portal.Error.NotAllowed: This call is not available inside the sandbox" [\#207](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/issues/207)

# Changelog

## [v1.4.4](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/tree/v1.4.4) (2022-06-27)

**Implemented enhancements:**

- Implement a Preferences Window [\#205](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/issues/205)
- Upgrade snap core to 20 and gnome extenstion to 3.34 or 3.38 [\#134](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/issues/134)
- Add a cleanup part to snap [\#107](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/issues/107)

**Fixed bugs:**

- Voice messages from contacts not being reproduced [\#203](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/issues/203)
- Link preview not working when we paste a link [\#201](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/issues/201)
- Stuck during changing from one chat to another [\#197](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/issues/197)
- database error occurred on your browser. Please restart your computer and relink your device [\#195](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/issues/195)
- Messages not received, stays on one tick [\#193](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/issues/193)
- Icon not respecting system icon theme [\#182](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/issues/182)
- Application freezes when attempting to display GIF, video or image [\#181](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/issues/181)
- Broken GIF Rendering on Ubuntu 20.04 with KDE Plasma \(debian package\) [\#166](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/issues/166)
- Only black window with nvidia, wayland and gnome [\#148](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/issues/148)



\* *This Changelog was automatically generated by [github_changelog_generator](https://github.com/github-changelog-generator/github-changelog-generator)*

# Changelog

## [v1.1.2](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/tree/v1.1.2) (2021-01-06)

**Implemented enhancements:**

- Add snap build to release workflow once there is a nice solution [\#72](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/issues/72)
- Show notification status in tray icon [\#67](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/issues/67)
- Integrate automatic deploying [\#26](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux/issues/26)


\* *This Changelog was automatically generated by [github_changelog_generator](https://github.com/github-changelog-generator/github-changelog-generator)*

* Moved application menu into popover
* Fixed file chooser dialog wasn't able to save to the desired location and set a different filename
* Several bug fixes and design improvements
* System tray icon

* Show/hide headerbar on key release
* Fix snapcraft build with core18

* Set visibility of header bar via left ALT key
* Zoom controls

* Change of titlebar/menubar to GNOME HeaderBar
* Enable right click inspection

* Remove dark mode option because now it has a built-in support
* Set spell checking for system language
